title: Ticket #7415: condor_status -compact problems rolling up p-slots into static slots
description:
when a machine contains both static and dynamic slots, the SLOTS column of the condor_status -compact output will only have the correct value if the first slot (sorted by name) is a p-slot. Otherwise condor_status will attempt to roll-up slot count into an attribute that does not exist in static slots NumDynamicSlots and the results will be that _ ias displayed as the slot count.

The problem was reported on Condor-Users like this 

Machine             Platform    Slots Cpus Gpus  TotalGb FreCpu  FreeGb  CpuLoad ST Jobs/Min MaxSlotGb
batch1051.desy.de   x64/CentOS7 _       48        251.64      1     4.00    0.45 Ui     0.00 *
...
bird-cfel01.desy.de x64/SL6        11   12        252.37      1   234.37    0.85 **     3.50      2.00

batch1051.desy.de has 10 static slots, and 1 dynamic slot (slot11), while bird-cfel01.desy.de has a single p-slot.

It should be noted at that as of 8.8, condor_status -compact does not count static slots at all (i.e. it does no rollup), that capability was scheduled for a later release, but has not yet happened.
